OUTLINE : This randomize , open-label , multicenter study . Patients randomize 1 2 treatment arm . - Arm I ( Interferon alfa monotherapy ) : Patients receive interferon alfa subcutaneously ( SC ) day 1 , 3 , 5 . Treatment continue weekly least 9 week absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . - Arm II ( Interferon alfa , interleukin-2 , fluorouracil combination therapy ) : Patients receive interferon alfa SC day 1 week 1 4 day 1 , 3 , 5 week 2 , 3 , 5 , 6 , 7 , 8 . Patients also receive interleukin-2 SC twice daily day 3-5 week 1 4 daily day 1 , 3 , 5 week 2 3 . Patients receive fluorouracil IV day 1 week 5-8 . Treatment repeat every 10 week 2 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Quality life assess baseline , 9 , 19 , 26 week , 8 month . Patients follow 8 , 10 , 12 month , every 4 month 1 year , every 6 month thereafter . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 670 patient ( 335 per treatment arm ) accrue study .
